name: OTP Master Bot - All-rounder
description: Production-grade Telegram OTP Forwarder Bot built with Python (Pyrogram) and MongoDB. Supports auto-detect AJAX type, cookie expiry alerts, per-site error analytics, and custom Telegram formatting.

OWNER_ID.description: Numeric Telegram User ID of the bot owner

MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB connection string (MongoDB Atlas or self-hosted)

CHECK_INTERVAL.description: AJAX poll interval in seconds (minimum 7 recommended)
